ClaimCoverage.name: ClaimCoverage
ClaimCoverage.description: Represents a causal part in a defective asset that requires repair or replacement.

AssetWarrantyId.description: The asset warranty ID of the defective asset in the associated claim item.

CausalPartId.description: The ID of the product part that causes the issues related to the claim.

ClaimId.description: The ID of the claim record associated with this claim coverage.

ClaimItemId.description: The ID of the claim item record associated with the claim coverage.

ClaimParticipantId.description: The ID of the claim participant record associated with this claim coverage.

Description.description: The description of the coverage for the claim.

ExtlWorkOrderReference.description: The external identifier of the work order.

FaultCodeId.description: The code ID that uniquely identifies the fault caused by the part.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the claim coverage.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.

ProductRelatedMaterialId.description: The ID of the Product Related Material record that defines the association between the causal part and the product associated with the claim.

RelatedClaimCoverageId.description: The claim coverage against which the supplier recovery claim is created.

Status.description: The status of a claim coverage.

TotalAdjustedAmount.description: The total amount that's adjusted in a claim.
